# Project: Draggable Buttons with Color Toggle

## Overview
Interactive Next.js + Vite application featuring draggable buttons with background color toggling and persistent dot placement.

## Features
- 10 clickable buttons with "click me" text
- Toggle between two background colors on click
- Manual drag functionality (no HTML drag/drop API)
- Dot placement at button center on mouse release
- Persistent dots that remain when buttons are moved again

## Development
- Run `npm run dev` to start the development server
- Built with Next.js and Vite for fast development experience
